France. Convention nationale
metadata.publisher: [Paris] : De l'imprimerie de Quiber-Pallissaux, dite des départemens, au coin du boulevart Poissonnière, no. 2,
metadata.citation: Monglond, A. France révolutionnaire et impériale, III, 163-4
metadata.description: At head of title: Convention nationale. Instruction publique

Two variant states known, one with a line printed below "Instruction publique" and last word "acti-" on p. [1], one without a line printed below "Instruction publique" and last word "grande" on p. [1]
Monglond, A. France révolutionnaire et impériale
Tourneux, M. Paris pendant la Révolution française
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title on front cover. Damaged and stained pages. Handwritten notes.
